article_title: Goddard College Should Revoke Invite to Mumia Abu-Jamal
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Sen. Pat Toomey, R-Pa., writes that Goddard College should revoke its invitation to convicted cop killer Mumia Abu-Jamal to deliver its commencement speech.
